name: The Key on Schmuck Mountain Demo
name_original: The Key on Schmuck Mountain Demo
description:
THE SUMMARY :

In The Key on Schmuck Mountain, you play as The Key on Schmuck Mountain. As this lonesome, faux gold Key, you traverse many of the odd innards of the strange, puzzling, and all around smelly Schmuck Mountain, with the main goal being to get to the mountain's peak.  Key will solve many puzzles to make his way through this cruddy ol' mountain. He will use items, push blocks, examine his environment, transform, and do many other things good puzzle solving heroes do.

FEATURES:

-A bunch of fools, dullards, idiots and schmucks who you will meet on your journey.

-A ton of funny items to use in puzzle crunching item object inventory action!

-Hopefully funny writing!

Credits:

Plugins done by: Galv, Yanfly, Moghunter, SunRndmDde, King Gerar, Taarna23

Music done by: TheMutantSpaceDancer, Phobophobia, DJ Sneakman.

Everything else done by: TheMutantSpaceDancer

TOTALLY REAL REVIEWS:

"The Key on Schmuck Mountain cured me of all 300 diseases I had" 8/10 -Jimmy Bruskits

"It was truly The Key on Schmuck Mountain" 3/5 - Tim, Buck and Too

"Please get out of my house" 1/10 - Macy the Lacy
